description: Focused, expressive and refined, layering the generous currant, blackberry. tobacco and dill flavors into a seamless package, rolling gently into a long finish against lightly prickly tannins. Best from 2018 through 2024. 245 cases made.

title: Big Table Farm 2014 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Pelos Sandberg Vineyard
description: Supple, expressive and appealing, with density and deft balance, offering rich blueberry and cherry flavors that come together smoothly on the generous finish. Drink now through 2024. 336 cases made.

title: Big Table Farm 2014 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Sunnyside Vineyard
description: Sleek and expressive, with complex layers of black cherry and blackberry. Hints of licorice and tar come together harmoniously as the finish gains momentum. Intense but not heavy. Drink now through 2024. 348 cases made.

title: Brick House 2014 Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Evelyn's
description: Firm and focused, with subtle tiers of cherry, orange peel, floral and dusky spice flavors, coming together harmoniously on the lithe finish. Has presence and depth. Drink now through 2024. 700 cases made.

title: Cristom 2014 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Estate
description: Expressive rose petal and black cherry aromas lead to plush and complex raspberry, spice box and dark tea flavors that gain momentum toward polished tannins. Drink now through 2023. 1,620 cases made.

title: Domaine Serene 2014 Chardonnay Dundee Hills Récolte Grand Cru
description: Seamless and refined, with floral pear and spice aromas and supple, layered Meyer lemon, stony mineral and blanched almond flavors that linger. Drink now through 2022. 245 cases made.

title: Domaine Serene 2014 Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Aspect
description: Impressively combines elegance with sleek complexity, offering expressive violet and raspberry aromas and precise, structured cherry, crushed stone and black tea flavors that gain traction toward refined tannins. Drink now through 2024. 742 cases made.

title: Domaine Serene 2014 Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Winery Hill Vineyard
description: A lovely, silky wine, with delicate layers of flavor, offering harmonious notes of black cherry, clove and spicy toast that linger. Drink now through 2023. 390 cases made.

title: Elk Cove 2014 Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Mount Richmond
description: Firm and focused, with powdery tannins surrounding a sleek core of guava-accented cherry, rose petal and spice flavors that glide into a long, vivid and mineral-marked finish. Has presence and elegance. Best from 2017 through 2024. 1,200 cases made.

title: Elk Cove 2014 Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Roosevelt
description: Dark and spicy, sleek and inviting for the black cherry, licorice, tomato leaf and clotted cream notes that come together harmoniously on the expressive finish. Drink now through 2024. 300 cases made.

title: Eminent Domaine 2014 Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge
description: Focused, expressive and layered with currant, plum, mineral and wet earth flavors that play against fine tannins and dance through the open-frame finish. Has presence, depth and persistence. Best from 2018 through 2024. 690 cases made.

title: Evening Land 2014 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills La Source Seven Springs Estate
description: Firm and focused, with powdery tannins around a lively core of rose petal–infused raspberry and blackberry flavors, gliding into a long and expressive finish marked by minerally notes of wet stone. Best from 2018 through 2024. 1,400 cases made.

title: Harper Voit 2014 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Antiquum Vineyard
description: Plush and expressive, wrapping fine-textured tannins around blueberry, cherry, smoke and spice notes, tumbling easily into a long finish. Drink now through 2022. 110 cases made.

title: Ken Wright 2014 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Canary Hill Vineyard
description: Supple and velvety, with layered flavors of cherry, blueberry, currant and spice set on an open-weave texture. The finish hovers with persistence and point. Drink now through 2024. 1,257 cases made.

title: Ken Wright 2014 Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Shea Vineyard
description: Taut and deftly wrought, with pretty mulberry and pomegranate flavors on a transparent frame, veiling the extended finish in delicately peppery tannins. Has presence and persistence. Best from 2018 through 2024. 1,465 cases made.

title: Lavinea 2014 Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Lazy River Vineyard
description: Supple, open-textured and focused, with powdery tannins underlying the cherry and black tea flavors, picking up stony notes as the finish rolls on. Has presence and impressive length. Best from 2017 through 2024. 225 cases made.

title: Beaux Frères 2013 Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Upper Terrace
description: Intensely and seductively aromatic, billowing purple plum, blueberry, blackberry and espresso notes that resolve on the velvety palate. The tension between the fruity and savory character persists into the long and vivid finish. Drink now through 2023. 366 cases made.

title: Beaux Frères 2013 Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Beaux Frères Vineyard
description: With a delicate and open texture, this shows lanolin and rose petal undertones to the red berry flavors. Gains depth with each sip.—Non-blind Beaux Frères vertical (October 2015). Drink now through 2025. 2,167 cases made.

title: Bergström 2013 Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Le Pré Du Col Vineyard
description: Supple, seductive and distinctive, with pure blueberry fruit, shaded with white pepper, pear skin and floral character. The flavors dance merrily into the long, deftly balanced finish. Offers presence and intensity without extra weight. Drink now through 2023. 1,500 cases made.

title: Evening Land 2013 Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard Summum
description: Taut, focused and juicy, with lemon, lemon verbena and mineral overtones to the lithe, lively, open-textured pear and apple flavors, which linger expressively as the finish floats on. Drink now through 2023. 288 cases made.

title: Antica Terra 2013 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Ceras
description: Sleek, transparent and immensely appealing, with an open texture, delicate structure and harmony, persisting on the finish, displaying dark berry, orange peel, black tea and loamy earth complexity. The finish sails on. Drink now through 2023. 949 cases made.

title: Ayoub 2013 Chardonnay Dundee Hills
description: Broad, open-textured and layered, with pear, grapefruit, quince and spice flavors that just don't quit as the tangy finish sails on. Has depth and distinctiveness. Drink now through 2021. 225 cases made.

title: Big Table Farm 2013 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Sunnyside Vineyard
description: This is supple, complex and harmonious, weaving together savory spice and autumn leaf overtones with ripe currant and black plum flavors. Open-textured and seductive, this unfurls gracefully through the long finish. Drink now through 2023. 211 cases made.

title: Evening Land 2013 Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
description: Taut, focused, complex and immediately inviting, deftly layering pear, nectarine, citrus, loamy earth and floral aromas and flavors as the finish plays on. Shows good tension between the fruit and savory notes. Drink now through 2023. 390 cases made.

title: Zena Crown Vineyard 2013 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills ∑ Single Vineyard
description: Light and zingy, dripping with gorgeous raspberry, strawberry and floral flavors, weaving in strong mineral notes as the finish gains momentum. A hint of pepper informs the aftertaste. Drink now through 2023. 302 cases made.

title: Antica Terra 2013 Chardonnay Willamette Valley Aurata
description: Focused, showing tremendous presence, with a bright beam of pear, honey, spice and floral notes that pierces the supple texture and persists into a long and expressive finish. Drink now through 2021. 160 cases made.

title: Antica Terra 2013 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Antikythera
description: Supple, silky and generous, with blueberry and cherry flavors. A streak of tomato leaf weaves through the transparent finish, wrapped in pillowy tannins. Drink now through 2023. 310 cases made.

title: Antica Terra 2013 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Botanica
description: Sleek and expressive, light-footed but dark-fruited, with currant and blackberry flavors standing up to the fine tannins, black tea hints and savory notes as the finish lingers. Shows more density than most from 2013. Drink now through 2020. 519 cases made.

title: Ayoub 2013 Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Estate Vineyard
description: Fresh, open and expressive, this offers a lively mix of cherry, raspberry, cinnamon and fresh toast flavors that mingle harmoniously on a long, detailed finish. The nubby tannins are well-integrated. Drink now through 2023. 400 cases made.

title: Bergström 2013 Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Winery Block
description: Open-textured, ripe and generous, delivering a range of cherry, blackberry, coffee and spice flavors that float over a thin layer of crisp tannins and persist enticingly on the finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 225 cases made.

title: Bergström 2013 Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Bergström Vineyard
description: Refreshing, polished and juicy, with orange peel–accented black cherry and floral flavors, showing hints of pepper and clove. Dances against a glassy texture and lingers enticingly. The finish exhibits pizzazz and grace. Drink now through 2023. 1,200 cases made.

title: Brick House 2013 Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Les Dijonnais
description: Fresh and expressive, soft in texture, this offers generous flavors of cherry, raspberry and clove that linger effortlessly against velvety tannins. Drink now through 2023. 517 cases made.

title: Chapter 24 2013 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley The Last Chapter
description: Crisp and focused, with a slight minty edge accenting the raspberry and red plum flavors, lingering on the sleek, open-textured finish. Drink now through 2020. 500 cases made.

title: Cherry Hill 2013 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills
description: Focused, light, lively and savory, with distinctive mineral notes coursing through the cherry and raspberry flavors, persisting on the finish with finesse and flair. Drink now through 2023. 1,488 cases made.

title: Domaine Serene 2013 Chardonnay Dundee Hills Clos de Lune Vineyard
description: Bright and generous, with complex flavors of nectarine, grapefruit, pear and flowers that swirl together harmoniously on the long and vivid finish. Keeps sailing along after the final sip. Drink now through 2020. 120 cases made.

title: Domaine Serene 2013 Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Fleur de Lis Vineyard
description: Supple and open-textured, with layers of blackberry, cherry and licorice flavors, accented by hints of pepper and tea leaf. Comes together harmoniously and intensely on the polished finish. Has presence and persistence. Drink now through 2024. 169 cases made.

title: Evening Land 2013 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
description: Fresh and inviting, open-textured and appealing, with cherry, floral and mineral flavors gliding smoothly into a harmonious finish. Has terrific presence, depth and persistence. Drink now through 2021. 850 cases made.

title: Formaglini 2013 Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains La Quercia Block
description: Polished, refined and light-footed, but packed with blackberry, black olive and rose petal flavors, persisting against a meaty note as the finish lingers expressively. Drink now through 2023. 300 cases made.

title: Ken Wright 2013 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Carter Vineyard
description: Endowed with layers of ripe plum, dark berry, dried flowers and savory, meaty nuances, this medium-weight wine has tremendous presence and harmony, right through the long and expressive finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 1,092 cases made.

title: Patton Valley 2013 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Lorna-Marie
description: Polished, showing a velvety texture to the deftly restrained black currant, plum, smoke and spice flavors, coming together harmoniously with a minerally streak on the precise finish. Drink now through 2023. 170 cases made.

title: Ponzi 2013 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Reserve
description: Fresh, focused and open-textured, layering plum, currant and crème fraîche flavors with the utmost delicacy. A light nudge of tannins underlines the impressively persistent finish. Drink now through 2023. 1,250 cases made.

title: Ponzi 2013 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Vigneto Bieze Vineyard
description: Bright and juicy, with tangy grapefruit notes that mingle harmoniously with the vivid cherry and raspberry flavors at the core, gliding into a polished and extended finish. Drink now through 2023. 90 cases made.

title: Purple Hands 2013 Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Stoller Vineyard
description: Light, lithe and seductively supple, with pure cherry and blackberry flavors at the center, gliding into an open texture that adds glints of pear and jasmine as the finish lingers easily. Drink now through 2022. 460 cases made.

title: Résonance 2013 Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Résonance Vineyard
description: Light and focused, showing distinctive subtlety. A layer of crinkly tannins underlies a pulsing core of mineral-accented cherry and red berry flavors, hinting at cinnamon as the finish lingers gently. Best from 2017 through 2023. 2,000 cases made.

title: Roco 2013 Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Wits' End Vineyard
description: Fresh and vital, with crisp tannins around a generous core of black cherry, cassis and floral notes that come together harmoniously on the long and expressive finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 322 cases made.

title: Trisaetum 2013 Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Ribbon Ridge Estate
description: Offers great presence, unfurling the blueberry, currant, plum and spice flavors on a sleek, narrowly focused frame. Finishes with snap and persistence. Drink now through 2023. 453 cases made.

title: Zena Crown Vineyard 2013 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Block 14 Single Vineyard
description: Sleek and inviting, polished and deep, with cherry, cinnamon, clove and mineral flavors that meld seamlessly and keep singing on the long and expressive finish. Drink now through 2023. 81 cases made.

title: Zena Crown Vineyard 2013 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Slope Single Vineyard
description: Rich and expressive, featuring black cherry and pepper notes set against tangy mineral flavors. Comes together smoothly as the finish gains traction, with a light bite of tannins. Drink now through 2023. 348 cases made.

title: Adelsheim 2013 Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Nicholas Vineyard
description: Supple, open-textured and inviting, with plum and currant fruit riding serenely over fine, nubby tannins and picking up black tea and pear flavors as the finish lingers. Drink now through 2023. 188 cases made.

title: Alexana 2013 Chardonnay Willamette Valley Terroir Selection
description: Supple, open-textured and harmonious, with orange peel–tinged pear and floral flavors on a generous frame, dancing lightly through the finish. Drink now through 2020. 1,589 cases made.

title: Anne Amie 2013 Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Twelve Oaks Estate
description: Open-textured, refreshing and distinctive, with soft-spoken black cherry, dark plum, leather and espresso flavors that come together harmoniously and gain momentum as the finish sails on. Drink now through 2023. 490 cases made.

title: Beaux Frères 2013 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Zena Crown
description: Supple, velvety and generous, layering blackberry, plum, licorice, pepper and floral flavors into an open-textured finish that lets the flavors keep singing harmoniously. Best from 2017 through 2023. 213 cases made.

title: Beaux Frères 2013 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley
description: Soft and supple, plush in texture, this open-weave style offers blueberry, red plum and thyme notes, blossoming with gentle insistence. The tannins are nicely absorbed. Drink now through 2023. 2,606 cases made.

title: Bergström 2013 Chardonnay Willamette Valley Sigrid
description: Generous and expressive on a frame that floats nicely, offering apricot-scented pear and spice flavors that pick up toasty notes as the finish lingers. Drink now through 2020. 1,100 cases made.

title: Bergström 2013 Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Silice
description: Firm in texture, this lithe bundle of black cherry, raspberry, espresso and smoke flavors comes together with integrity on the harmonious finish. Needs time to soften the tannins. Best from 2018 through 2023. 1,600 cases made.

title: Bergström 2013 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Temperance Hill Vineyard
description: Light and sleek, playing cherry and blueberry flavors against a polished texture that lets the finish gain momentum and persist impressively. A classic example of getting the most out of a light vintage. Drink now through 2021. 290 cases made.

title: Big Table Farm 2013 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Pelos Sandberg Vineyard
description: Fresh and sleek, with nubby tannins underlying the cherry and blueberry flavors, mingling harmoniously as the finish lingers. Drink now through 2022. 303 cases made.

title: Björnson 2013 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Edward
description: Supple, complex and complete, with a harmonious array of cherry, orange peel, black tea and gentle spice flavors that come together smoothly against refined tannins on the long finish. Drink now through 2021. 100 cases made.

title: Brick House 2013 Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Cuvée du Tonnelier
description: Vibrant, focused, open-textured and distinctive, with savory elements weaving through the cherry and crème fraîche flavors, extending smoothly into a long finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 570 cases made.

title: Chehalem 2013 Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Ridgecrest Vineyards
description: Bright and lively, polished in texture and light-footed, with currant and plum flavors on a sleek frame, lingering effortlessly. Drink now through 2023. 440 cases made.

title: Chehalem 2013 Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Ridgecrest Vineyards Reserve
description: Bright, crisp, tangy and appealing, showing transparency and vibrant raspberry and strawberry flavors, layered with hints of mint and thyme blossom. Finishes with vivid presence. Drink now through 2021. 430 cases made.

title: de Lancellotti 2013 Chardonnay Willamette Valley
description: Supple, expressive and elegant, with polished texture to the relatively light but intense pear, pepper and fresh cream flavors, lingering effectively. Has depth and presence. Drink now through 2018. 50 cases made.

title: Domaine Serene 2013 Chardonnay Dundee Hills Récolte Grand Cru
description: Open-textured, broad and expressive, with zingy citrus and silvery tinges to the pear and mineral flavors, lingering on the zippy finish. Drink now through 2021. 257 cases made.

title: Domaine Serene 2013 Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Grace Vineyard
source: Wine Spectator Magazine Issue Web Only - 2017
description: Supple and generous, this is light-footed, with black cherry, orange peel, tea and spice flavors set against well-mannered tannins. Persistent on the long finish. Best from 2018 through 2023. 321 cases made.

title: Erath 2013 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Leland
description: Refined, with an open texture to the delicately precise red plum, raspberry, white chocolate and floral flavors, gliding elegantly into a long and expressive finish. Has presence and impressive length. Drink now through 2023. 554 cases made.

title: Evening Land 2013 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard
description: Crisp and tangy, with a mineral character running through the raspberry and cherry flavors at the core, coming together with harmony and structural tension on the vibrant finish. Best from 2017 through 2023. 3,054 cases made.

title: Evening Land 2012 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
description: Seductive, silky and supple, this red layers its gorgeous currant, plum, blueberry and spice flavors on a lithe frame, coming together harmoniously on the long, expressive finish. Drink now through 2022. 1,176 cases made.

title: Beaux Frères 2012 Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Upper Terrace
description: Sleek, silky and expressive, full-bodied but not heavy, polished to bring out the glow of the cherry, raspberry sassafras and cinnamon flavors that just won't quit as the finish sails on. Has depth, wrapped in satiny tannins, and real harmony. Best from 2015 through 2024. 579 cases made.

title: Evening Land 2012 Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard La Source
description: Fresh, elegant and expressive, with a lovely open texture that lets the spicy, minerally pear and pineapple flavors glow brightly as the finish gains momentum. Has depth and sinuous shape. Drink now through 2020. 350 cases made.

title: Evening Land 2012 Chardonnay Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard Summum
description: Bright and vibrant, this is dazzling with its depth of pear, tangerine cream and pineapple flavors, plus a cascade of mineral aromatics that tumble through the very long finish. This has intensity on a relatively light frame, and then backs off and lets the flavors coast for what seems like minutes. Drink now through 2025. 300 cases made.

title: Evening Land 2012 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Seven Springs Vineyard
description: Sleek and silky, brimming with raspberry, blackberry, pear and licorice flavors that come together seamlessly on the long, polished finish. This has depth and presence. Drink now through 2022. 3,149 cases made.

title: Adelsheim 2012 Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Quarter Mile Lane Vineyard
description: Fresh and vibrant, bursting with currant, plum and boysenberry fruit, gently wrapped in sandy tannins. Remains lively, showcasing acidity and expressive flavors as the finish lingers. Drink now through 2022. 60 cases made.

title: Alexana 2012 Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Signature
description: Sleek, open-textured and appealing, with satiny-smooth raspberry, cranberry and guava flavors, dancing lightly through the long, delicate and satisfying finish, interrupted only by slightly raspy tannins. Drink now through 2022. 330 cases made.

title: Beaux Frères 2012 Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge The Beaux Frères Vineyard
description: This has tremendous presence and persistence. Focused and expressive, rich in texture and brimming with black cherry, plum, espresso and white pepper flavors that don't quit as the finish rolls on. The tannins are well-integrated, letting the flavors pop. Best from 2015 through 2024. 1,340 cases made.

title: Bergström 2012 Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Winery Block
description: Vibrant, expressive and dense, featuring cherry and currant fruit pushing against the powdery tannins. Intense but far from weighty, with hints of mineral, smoke and pepper darting in and out. Complex. Best from 2016 through 2022. 264 cases made.

title: Bergström 2012 Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Bergström Vineyard
description: Complex and harmonious, beautifully balancing the red cherry, raspberry and dark plum flavors against hints of tea leaf, espresso and river stones, coming together smoothly and easily. The expressive finish rolls on and on. Best from 2015 through 2024. 1,203 cases made.

title: Bethel Heights 2012 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Flat Block
description: Glass-smooth and polished, brimming with boysenberry, plum, rhubarb pie and exotic spice flavors, coming together into a taut, medium-weight and expressive finish, persisting impressively. Drink now through 2022. 245 cases made.

title: Big Table Farm 2012 Chardonnay Willamette Valley
description: This is brilliantly focused, tangy and balanced, offering towering flavors of pear, pineapple, cream and floral on a pinpoint of acidity, broadening into an expressive, explosive finish. Delivers tremendous precision, persistence and expression. Drink now through 2020. 246 cases made.

title: Big Table Farm 2012 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley
description: Vibrant and intense, pulsing with mint-edged raspberry and spice flavors that ride easily over velvety tannins and persist on the refined, gently minerally finish. Drink now through 2022. 784 cases made.

title: Bomb 2012 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley
description: Supple, expressive, multilayered and harmonious, this teems with ripe currant, plum and blueberry fruit, weaving in espresso, cream and nutmeg notes as the finish expands against polished tannins. Drink now through 2022. 248 cases made.

title: Brick House 2012 Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Evelyn's
description: Focused, juicy, precise and expressive, offering a gorgeously balanced mouthful of plum, currant, red berry and floral notes that come together harmoniously and persist on the long finish. Shows depth and distinction. Best from 2016 through 2022. 480 cases made.

title: Soter 2012 Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Mineral Springs Ranch
description: Vibrant, expressive and multi layered, offering black cherry, red plum, sassafras and dead leaf flavors on a long and silky frame. The tannins are submerged, allowing the gorgeous flavors to float through the finish. Drink now through 2022. 1,500 cases made.

title: Stoller 2012 Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Helen's
description: Polished, round and seductive, this open-textured version brims with blackberry, cherry and plum flavors that take off and soar over the long finish. Offers depth and presence, finishing with elegance. Drink now through 2025. 350 cases made.

title: Adelsheim 2012 Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Boulder Bluff Vineyard
description: Broad and spicy, with a strong streak of minerality to underpin the ripe black cherry, dark plum, tobacco and spice flavors that expand and extend into the long, vibrant finish. Offers density and transparency, a rare combination. Drink now through 2022. 445 cases made.

title: Adelsheim 2012 Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Ribbon Springs Vineyard
description: Full-bodied and expressive, layering ripe blackberry, dark plum, green olive and spice flavors onto a supple frame, persisting on the long and expansive finish. This has presence, with fine tannins that don't get in the way. Drink now through 2022. 411 cases made.

title: Archery Summit 2012 Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Archer's Edge Estate
description: Lively and inviting, with lavish fruit character and a mouthful of blackberry, boysenberry and black cherry flavors. Set on a lithe, open-textured frame, this picks up hints of spice and verbena as the finish lingers. The tannins are well-contained. Drink now through 2022. 493 cases made.

title: Aubichon 2012 Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge Armstrong Vineyard
description: Focused, with great presence to the spicy, peppery blackberry and cherry flavors, splayed over a polished frame and lingering on the expressive finish. Deep and persistent. Drink now through 2022. 135 cases made.

title: Bergström 2012 Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Silice
description: Supple, complex and harmonious, offering a multilayered mouthful of cherry, plum, black tea, orange flower and warm stone flavors, all coming together on the closely woven, finely tannic finish, persisting expressively. Best from 2016 through 2022. 1,660 cases made.

title: Bethel Heights 2012 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills West Block
description: Fleshy, open-textured and light on its feet, with pretty strawberry and tomato leaf flavors that widen into red plum and spice elements as the finish expands and lengthens. Drink now through 2022. 95 cases made.

title: Bethel Heights 2012 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Illahe Vineyards
description: Firm and focused, in an expansive style, this light-footed version melds black currant, plum and delicate spice flavors into a mouthfilling package that floats through the long finish. Drink now through 2022. 113 cases made.

title: Big Table Farm 2012 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills Cattrall Brothers Vineyard
description: Bright, focused and generous, with red berry, cinnamon and plum flavors, playing harmoniously on a vivid, lively canvas. Offers presence, elegance and refreshing lift on the finish. Drink now through 2022. 161 cases made.

title: Boedecker 2012 Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Shea Vineyard
description: Taut, focused, light, lively and inviting, with pepper and clove accents around a vivid core of cherry and raspberry fruit, dancing easily through the long and expressive finish. Drink now through 2022. 175 cases made.

title: Brittan 2012 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Basalt Block
description: Taut, tart and vividly expressive, bursting with red berry flavors and overtones of spice and tomato leaf. The finish persists with relish and clear minerality. Needs time to settle, but has plenty to offer. Best from 2016 through 2022. 775 cases made.

title: Chapter 24 2012 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley 00 Hyland
description: Firm in texture and a bit tart. Despite featuring a raw edge to the cherry and cinnamon flavors at the center, this has waves of minerality on the remarkably harmonious and open-textured finish. Cascading with subtle elements, this gains depth and complexity with every sip. Best from 2017 through 2025. 25 cases made.

title: Colene Clemens 2012 Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Adriane
description: Distinctly spicy and peppery, this is layered, complex and harmonious, with generous cherry and floral flavors on an open-weave frame. The tannins are well-submerged in the mix, and the finish echoes beautifully. Drink now through 2022. 1,096 cases made.

title: Colene Clemens 2012 Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Victoria
description: Open-textured, expressive and precise, layering black cherry, clove, tea leaf and floral flavors on a gentle frame, gliding into a long and harmonious finish. Elegant and intense. Drink now through 2022. 368 cases made.

title: Cornerstone 2012 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley
description: Supple, ripe and expressive, unfurling ripe blueberry, plum and spice flavors on a bed of velvety tannins. Finishes with persistence and elegance. Drink now through 2022. 1,500 cases made.

title: Domaine Drouhin 2012 Chardonnay Dundee Hills Édition Limitée
description: Taut, with a raw edge to the vibrant Bosc pear, white nectarine and mineral flavors—a profile that would be familiar to those who like Meursault. The elements meld seamlessly on the long and expressive finish. Best from 2016 through 2022. 149 cases made.

title: Domaine Serene 2012 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Jerusalem Hill Vineyard
description: Supple, velvety and focused, aiming the cherry, currant and floral flavors through a veil of fine tannins into the long and expressive finish. Offers presence, deftness and elegance. Drink now through 2022. 434 cases made.

title: Elizabeth Chambers Cellar 2012 Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Lazy River Vineyard
description: Polished, refreshing and expressive, layered with peppermint accents that run through the black cherry and spice flavors. Presents a plush frame, showing transparency and persistence as the finish lingers. Best from 2017 through 2025. 372 cases made.

title: Elk Cove 2012 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Five Mountain
description: Vibrant, spicy and minerally, with crushed-gravel overtones to the dark berry, black cherry and cocoa flavors, persisting easily against fine tannins on the long, expressive and open finish. Best from 2016 through 2022. 532 cases made.

title: Elk Cove 2012 Pinot Noir Willamette Valley Mount Richmond
description: Broad and expressive, not heavy but dense, with cherry, black plum and rose petal flavors that soar over refined tannins into the long and harmonious finish. Best from 2015 through 2022. 793 cases made.

title: Eminent Domaine 2012 Pinot Noir Ribbon Ridge
description: Ripe, round and expressive, not weighty but intense and complex, layering dark berry and plum fruit with wax and mineral nuances. Finishes with a hint of root beer, showing power and finesse. Drink now through 2022. 405 cases made.

title: Expression 2012 Pinot Noir Eola-Amity Hills 44º Zena Crown Vineyard
description: Ripe and expressive, plush and generous, offering plum at the core and savory spice nuances around the edges. Finishes with intensity, roundness and flair. Drink now through 2022. 102 cases made.

title: Ghost Hill 2012 Pinot Noir Yamhill-Carlton District Bayliss-Bower Vineyard
